comment.author: 25053835@N03
comment._content:
A venerable bunch of women's rights advocates! Anyone have any leads on Billington's first name (she's the one seated to the far left)? This is one of the new photos added to a set of images with unidentified or misidentified individuals in our "Science Service" and "Women in Science" sets.

Catherine Shteynberg
Smithsonian Institution Archives

comment.author: 71553333@N05
comment._content: That's my great grandmother! Barbara Ireton

comment.author: 25053835@N03
comment._content:
Thank you both for getting in touch! I am certainly interested in learning more about your grandmother, Ms. Barbara Ireton. If you're willing, please feel free to send us an email or reply back with a lighthearted anecdote.

All the best, 

Susannah 
Smithsonian Institution Archives
